help-file.title: HALFLING
help-file.content:
Halflings are remarkably small humanoids that are renowned for being goodhearted and naive. Customarily thieves by nature, halflings are much weaker than humans, but possess impressive dexterity and often have a penchant towards meticulousness. Unfortunately for other beings who must deal with them, they also have a tendency toward kleptomania. They also possess infravision. They are the smallest of the races, and often overlooked.
Classes: Warrior, Cleric, Shaman, Sorcerer, Thief, Mercenary, Bard & Illusionist. Statistics: Halflings have absolutely amazing dexterity, and tend to be fast on their feet as well, they are however, much weaker than humans, and tend not to be as smart or wise either. They are 'cute' though, so no one tends to notice. Innates: Infravision
